parameters.description: The message to be posted to this endpoint

parentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent list item

legacyParentKey.description: Legacy list item parent key, hidden by default. For use [Accessing legacy keys]

parentId.description: The unique identifier of parent list item

categoryId.description: The unique identifier of the category that the list belongs to

displayFormat.description: Whether we display code or value first

id.description: The unique identifier of the error associated with the response or is it error response itself

message.description: The detailed message of the validation error

source.description: The type of validation which failed
